Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for x86-64 Containers) 2025.1 (Build 223U)

Class.name: Ens.AlertRequest

Property.name: SourceConfigName
Property.Description: Name of the business host that is sending the alert

Property.name: AlertDestination
Property.Description: Field for designating the external destination of this alert message

Property.name: AlertTime
Property.Description: Time at which the alert was created.

Property.name: SessionId
Property.Description: The session in which the Alert occurred.
